DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to compare the efficacy of aripiprazole with placebo in combination with lithium or valproate monotherapy, in the treatment of bipolar I patients with manic or mixed episodes.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Aripiprazole in Patients With Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of bipolar I disorder, manic or mixed episode First manic or mixed episode Allergic, intolerant, or unresponsive to lithium and valproate or to aripiprazole Participation in a previous clinical trial within the past month or ever participated in a trial with aripiprazole
